WRITING.TEXT: As much as we can. I am a morning shower person, he's an evening shower guy. Either way, we both sneak into each others showers very often. We enjoy the coziness, peaceful moments, and I guess also cleaning each other. Probably one of my favorite things to do.
Thanks for taking the time to answer, you definitely gave some input!
Trial and error sounds like a good option for now. Thanks!
Trial and error sounds like a good option for now. Thanks!

Good luck!! I'm sure you can do it. I myself start next week. Let's hope we both do well :)

You should check out Emily Noel's review on her blog beauty broadcast. She did a comparison on the revealed 1 with naked 1 2. It really helped me see how similar they are and that's why I purchased it

Face: Revlon colorstay foundation for dry skin - 150 buff MAC prolongwear concealer in NC15 Estee Lauder double matte powder - 01 light Benefit watts up as highlight MAC prolongwear blush in stay pretty
Eyes: MAC prolongwear concealer in NC15 as primer Coastal scents revealed 2 palette Revlon colorstay liquid eyeliner in black Shu uemura eyelash curler L'oreal mega volume collagene mascara on top lashes MAC extended play lash mascara on bottom lashes
Brows: Anastasia Beverly Hills brow powder in medium brown Maybelline brow drama mascara in medium brown
Lips: Ofra cosmetics lip liner in wine Flormar long wear lipstick in L38

I have the 88 warm palette, its OK.... I bought it when I was first getting into makeup a few years ago. However the new revealed palettes are amazing. Soft shadows, pigmented, last a long time on me. I have both the revealed 1 2 and they're just beautiful. Great selection of mattes as well. And just in case you don't know, revealed 1 has dupes for almost all shades on naked 1 and 2. Revealed 2 has dupes for naked 3!! GOOD dupes.

Yeah, I was going to say the same about the teeth, it happens to me as well. The red OP chose is not a blue based red, so it can make teeth look yellower than they're. I would say get some crest whitestrips. I've gone through a bunch of them and my favorite one was the professional effects kind. The red does suit you a lot and compliments your eyes and completion! I have to say I usually take my mom's advice, except for when it comes to makeup! Haha
You mean a very nude, or something more natural that won't make you look dead?
You know that thing when you're thinking about what happened a few moments after? That's when all the clever things come up haha
I guess she's a stupid lady with no boundaries!
Damn, would slap him I think!!

When people stick their noses when they aren't even asked. I recently lost 8 kg and went from 67kg to 59kg (22yo, 160cm). Naturally my stomach is quite flat but my legs are more chubby. I finally started feeling better about my body. Then today, this random lady at work who I barely ever talked with came up to me and said: "you're pretty, but your legs are fat. You should work on that" Excuse me?!?!
Thanks, we'll look into that
Unfortunately he had to take a plane today to another country, about 12 hours after it happened. I think he'll only be able to see a doctor in about a week.

Love this so much!!! Worth the money BTW, like somebody mentioned, I also have a sample I've been using for over a year. It's beautiful and natural looking. Great for fair skin girls who struggle to find a flattering highlight shade

WRITING.TITLE: [QUESTION] I want to start exercising from home and need help
WRITING.TEXT:
In the past few months I went from 148lbs (67kg) to 132 lbs (60kg) and I'm 5"2. I was very happy with my progress, but I have plateaud for about a month. So... Obviously it's time to incorporate exercise. I want to lose around 5 to 10 more pounds, but I also want to get more toned and defined.
I can't afford a gym, so I want to start going on walks. I also want to start doing exercises to tone (squats and stuff like that) and was wondering what you can recommend me as an exercise routine. How many times a week should I walk and how many times the other exercises? What kind of routine? What move how many reps?
Thank you!!
Coastal scents revealed
I was nine years old and lived in Uruguay. I was at school, it was a Jewish school. I remember parents picking up their children because they feared more attacks against jews

Good timing on this question, since just yesterday I was so ticked I thought I would kill somebody. A client took a moisturizer tester by herself. I was on my way to give her a spatula to get the product out and saying "wait let me give you a spatula for that", but she decided to stick her dirty finger in the cream and took a giant blob one could never put on their face. Although...my surprise came when she started rubbing it on HER FEET. Obviously I told her off, and she left my counter. When I turned around, I also noticed she left her coffee cup on the counter. Who does this?!?!?!
Never tried WnW lipsticks, but totally agree on Rommel Stay Matte. I got way to frustrated and ended up throwing it away after it shattered in my purse!

Cetaphil cleanser, acne.org moisturizer. My biggest tip would be to take moisturizing very seriously from day one! As in, tomorrow pretend your skin is super dry, including lips and eyes. (Get an eye cream even of you're a man please!!) Another thing I like is incorporating jojoba oil into your moisturizer, just add in a few drops and mix on your palm. This was something I learnt on acne.org Now for me, now I'm on month four and have been experiencing some horrible dryness on my arms. Get a very good body cream and apply that from day one as well. I'm sure if I had done that my issues wouldn't be so bad.

WRITING.TITLE: What product do you keep buying despite of its bad packaging?
WRITING.TEXT:
You love the product, but the packaging is fussy/bad/ugly looking.
For me, MAC prolongwear concealer. I went through three of these, even though the stupid pump dispenses enough product for three uses! I get annoyed every time I use it!

I have been on 40mg a day since starting the course and didn't experience an initial break out. I stopped breaking out completely before hitting two months. You never know how you will react to accutane until you take it. Keep in mind having a bad IB is totally worth it if it means clear skin when it's done. Good luck!

Reminds me of a time my boyfriend came to my workplace and we chose a birthday present for my dad. No PDA since its work and I wasn't comfortable. When he left one of the ladies who works with me said my friend looks like a wonderful guy, and by the way he was looking at me maybe I should give him a chance at a relationship because it looks like he adores me. Well yeah, I adore him too!
Yeah I agree on this one. What moisturizer are you using?

Pulling out is not birth control. You must use a condom, they're cheap (a baby or an abortion would be more expensive!) Be responsible about your sex life. If you aren't ready to get pregnant you need to understand that it is your responsibility to use some sort of pregnancy prevention method. Birth control pills, condoms. You should be aware of the fact that you can get pregnant by just a minute of sex even from pre cum. Take this issue under your control and don't expect your man yo wrap it up without you telling him. Go buy condoms. Good luck
